name: wafermap
description: 반도체 품질 관리 통합 대시보드의 리팩토링된 버전입니다.

scripts.session-info: node -e "const manager = require('./scripts/utils/chatSessionManager'); const m = new manager(); console.log(m.getSessionInfo());"
scripts.session-list: node -e "const manager = require('./scripts/utils/chatSessionManager'); const m = new manager(); console.log('Previous sessions:', m.listPreviousSessions());"
